column5: Looking for a good ramp to access the Larry near the Forty Acre shoal. Any recommendations?

http://www.boatlaunches.ca/st-lawrence-river-boat-ramps https://www.gananoque.ca/sites/gananoque.ca/files/Parking Brochure 2018.pdf http://www.travel1000islands.ca/directory/gananoque-marina No idea if that helps?

The Gan launch is not the greatest due to distance to parking.Â  I launch at the Grass Creek site (free) in Kingston and work my way downstream hitting a number of musky spots along the way to Forty Acre shoal. https://www.cityofkingston.ca/residents/recreation/parks-trails/grass-creek-park
Thanks Mitch, this is what i'm looking for as Im coming in from the GTA.
Grass Creek Park launch is usually good and rarely busy plus it's free! If the water levels are down sometimes it can be a little sketchy getting out!
